title: Establishes an alternative youth criminal court for the city of Buffalo
summary: Establishes an alternative youth criminal court for the city of Buffalo; creates an additional city court judge to preside over the new alternative youth criminal court; judge shall be elected at the general election in November 2011 and shall first take office January 1, 2012.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act, in relation to providing for an additional city court judge for the city of Buffalo; relating to the establishment of an alternative youth criminal court whereby the additional city court judge presides over such court
